main_definition: To appear intelligent or knowledgeable, often by using clever language or gestures.

meanings_and_examples.example: She gave a looksmart impression during the meeting with her insightful comments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving off an air of being well-informed or erudite
meanings_and_examples.example: When asked about current events, he always looks smart by referencing recent studies and articles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing one's intelligence through nonverbal cues
meanings_and_examples.example: His confident posture and firm handshake gave him a looksmart vibe when he entered the room.
